name: This is not a Drill
description:
Submission for the Unreal Engine 2019 Epic Mega Jam

Team Name: Perkerakia

Game Name: This is not a Drill

This is not a Drill is a Fast-Paced Arcade Game.

"The Calamari Empire will bring chaos and destruction upon all living creatures."

Game Description:

Your mission is simple my fellow squids. Maintain the integrity of your vessel as it descends upon Earth's crusty mantle. You will complete your quest once you've reached your destination and utterly destroy their Planet. Afterwards, stories of your victory will be heard upon all curves of the Galaxy.

During your descent, you will be required to perform a wide range of actions in order to keep the vessel's core functionality running.

Such tasks might include: 

- Maneuvering the vessel and maintaining a safe course away from hazardous obstacles such us lava and hard rock. Your radar will help you in this endeavor
- Controlling the vessel's pressure, temperature, and oxygen levels. Keep your Plant Tanks safe at all cost and don't forget to turn around the central valve.
- Putting down any fires that might occur along the way. Use that fire extinguisher we gave you.

You can also power up the vessel's drill to descent faster or use that energy on the radar system. The choices are yours... good luck!

The game can be played by one or two players.

Player 1 Controls: 

- Movement: W/A/S/D
- Use: Y
- Crouch: G

Player 2 Controls:

- Movement: Arrow keys
- Use: PgUp
- Crouch: PgDn

List of Pre-Jam Assets:

  • Textures/Materials - We are using a material from Real Liquid X
  • Particles - We are using a few Infinity Blade Particles

The rest of the Assets/Blueprints/etc were created by us during the Mega Game Jam period
